attributes.action: Make Record Labels, Film and TV companies make licensing content easy and simple
attributes.additional_details:
Once Apple, then Spotify, and now Violet a new start up media company is struggling with licensing. Since January 2014 Violet has discussed with several major companies about licensing content and states that there is a lack of communication or structure in place to licence content.

http://www.thembj.org/2012/12/music-startups-and-the-licensing-drag/

http://www.authorsocieties.eu/uploads/Modules/Library/the_truth_about_music_licensing_in_europe.pdf

https://www.facebook.com/2014Violet
attributes.background: This issue is wide spread among start up businesses that need to licence media content, usually because new age digital businesses business models don't comply with the existing licensing infrastructures. Media licensing is overdue an update to promote the growth of licensed legal media services.

rejection.details: We're not sure exactly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You could start a new petition calling clearly for the specific action you want.
